result.adr_address: Shop C Ground Level, 148-154 Jaffe Rd, Wan Chai, Hong Kong
result.formatted_address: Shop C Ground Level, 148-154 Jaffe Rd, Wan Chai, Hong Kong
result.name: The Oyster House

reviews.text:
I came here for the Oysters and I was amazed with the quality. Really good cosy restaurant that serve very good Oyster! Staffs are very friendly, knowledgeable and great. Know their Oysters well. Must try the clams in white wine sauce! Excellent! Please make sure you either cone early or make reservations.

Came back here again after a while... just as good. Oyster was amazingly good and fresh! Crab cake was delicious and my favourite white wine clams! Must try! Enjoy.
Lovely place! Nice food and friendly staffs!

The oysters here are fantastic. The cooked food is great as well. Overall, a good experience. There's something about eating some freshly/expertly shucked oysters that can't be compared with any other cold appetizer. You get that feeling here. Exceptional. Now the cooked food is great as well, but it's just not as majestic as the oysters.  The gillardeau is my personal fave.

Seafood is good. Pizza is so-so. Oyster is the biggest reason to come here.

Reservation is highly recommended. Place got packed by 7 on a weekday.
Small place but good food and good service

result.vicinity: Shop C Ground Level, 148-154 Jaffe Road, Wan Chai

result.adr_address: Shop C Ground Level, 148-154 Jaffe Rd, Wan Chai, 香港
result.formatted_address: Shop C Ground Level, 148-154 Jaffe Rd, Wan Chai, 香港
result.name: The Oyster House

reviews.text:
放工走到灣仔和老弟去吃一間小餐館，這家是在網上無意看到的，看着那甜品很吸引，所以慕名而來。

餐廳不難找，離灣仔地鐵很近，晚上人也不少。坐下先點了六隻蠔，每人三隻剛好。

餐包接著也上，暖暖的柔軟也好吃。蠔接着也上枱了，配上兩杯白酒，白酒易入口又順滑。蠔分別有南非的Rollex，西班牙的Spainish Rock和法國的Lambert，每歍都很新鮮，飽滿且帶濃濃的海水味。小店竟提供6個產地的蠔，愛蠔之人不可錯過!!!

餐湯是野菌湯和蠔湯，野菌湯可以食到粒粒蘑菇蓉，而我喜歡我的蠔湯，因為味道清清地得來，又有很濃的海鮮精髓在其中。

這裏的招牌單骨雞翼一定要試！！因為份量很多之餘味道也很好。雞翼炸得香脆可口，沒有拆骨的煩惱，是懶人恩物。

卡邦尼意粉也是我的心頭好，很喜歡這裏把芝士磨得碎碎的鋪面，份量是特多，所以滿滿的芝士香。因此意粉醬汁吃下去沒有很膩，加上煙肉的咸香，味道令人很驚喜。

另一個主菜豬鞍，份量也是很驚人，看着成寸半的扒，食肉獸大喜。豬鞍雖然很有厚度，可是肉質嫩而juicy。伴碟的新薯，意想不到的好食！

吃罷這個豬鞍，其實已經飽得可以，但我地仍不忘那招牌的香蕉拖肥蛋糕。上枱一刻再次驚訝，因為份量很大。輕輕叉一口，𠝹開那層次分明的蛋糕，那輕滑柔軟的質感的確令人好驚喜！配上香焦，令單調的蛋糕變得煥然一新。

完全罷脫拖肥甜膩膩的一貫想法，那厚厚的cream配上香蕉和蛋糕，還有淡淡酒的甜香，這蛋糕完全令我著迷！！縱使飽得走不動，但仍毫不猶豫將之一口一口往嘴裏送，可見它的吸引力有多高。

小小的餐廳，每道菜質素都高，價錢和份量都很對得住食客，真心推薦。

I came here for the Oysters and I was amazed with the quality. Really good cosy restaurant that serve very good Oyster! Staffs are very friendly, knowledgeable and great. Know their Oysters well. Must try the clams in white wine sauce! Excellent! Please make sure you either cone early or make reservations.

Came back here again after a while... just as good. Oyster was amazingly good and fresh! Crab cake was delicious and my favourite white wine clams! Must try! Enjoy.
全條上碟的龍脷，好味又認真
